website_summaries.verdict: A good entry-level pair of road cycling shoes to see how proper cycling shoes feel and function on the bike.
pros: Nylon sole is stronger and more durable than typical rubber soles found on budget options
Leather upper is strong and durable
cons: Shoes sometimes appear in the wrong color

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and for a great price. I wear Nike Womens 8 and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job and for a great price. I wear Nike Womens 8 and the 40 fits perfectly, with a little wiggle room for my toes. Clips are easy to install, make sure you crank them in pretty tight.
customer_reviews.author: E L F

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit snugly. I wear a 9.5 shoe and bought a 42 in these shoes. My toes are right down at the end but I don't think a full size bigger would have been better. I use these on a peloton bike with Look Delta cleats. They are comfortable while riding.
customer_reviews.author: MN-Mom

customer_reviews.title: Size Up for Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman's 8.5, and wear all of my shoes in this size. I know spinning shoes can run a hair smaller, I bought a 9.5/42 and they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Morris

customer_reviews.title: Size up for a good fit!
customer_reviews.text: I got my pair today. I followed the advice and ordered a size up. I wear women's 81/2 in regular shoes and I ordered size 42 in these cycle shoes. Great fit and the quality is excellent. I also ordered Shimano SPD cleat set with the multi-direction release. The cleats attached to the shoes with no problems ( looked at how-to videos online) I think these shoes will work out great tomorrow in indoor spin class !
customer_reviews.author: mommy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for the Peloton bike!!! I always have a hard time finding shoes that fit, and these are great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for indoor cycling; fit small
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these, along with Shimano SPD cleats, to use at Equinox and SoulCycle spin classes. They are perfect and were comfortable from the first ride. No breaking in needed. However, I believe the sizing recommendations are a bit off and inconsistent, because I usually wear a size 8 and ordered a 40 per the recommendation on the official Shimano website. The 40s were very snug on my foot and too tight at the toe. The 41s have a little room at the toe, but after riding, I determined this is perfect. Would recommend sizing up one size if on the fence.
customer_reviews.author: SKM15

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for this beginner
customer_reviews.text: I am a 7.5 and the 40 fit me perfectly with just enough room that my toes won't mash inside the shoe. The fit is perfect-- not too tight for my wider feet. I'm new to spinning, so I wanted a decent shoe that wasn't crazy expensive, but still kinda cute. These meet all of that criteria. I installed SPD cleats and tried them out. They're perfect and I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: wheatbix

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for indoor cycling
customer_reviews.text: I wear these for my indoor cycling class. The cleats were easy to install and they clip into the cycle machines easily. The soles are hard, which is what one needs to keep good form when pushing down on the pedals. Breathable shoe all around. Note: because the cleats sit on top, these are not shoes to wear around. There are some cycling shoes that are meant for crossing training, like triathlons, where the cleats sink into the shoe. This is not that shoe.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: went with Shimano based on the recommendation of my favorite instructor, and i'm really happy with them
customer_reviews.text: i've been taking spin classes for the last few months and finally decided to take the plunge and buy some shoes. went with Shimano based on the recommendation of my favorite instructor, and i'm really happy with them! it makes such a difference on my ride. i wear size 9.5 regular shoes and went with size 42. they fit perfectly! snug enough that i feel secure on the pedals, but a little room in the toe box. note: you will need to buy cleats and a cleat adapter separately. even if the cleats say that they are compatible with the shoes, you still need the adapter - a separate plastic piece that they screw into.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Cousineau

customer_reviews.title: and these shoes have been perfect (I purchased with the Shimano PD-M324 pedals)
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to improve my performance during my at home spinning sessions, and these shoes have been perfect (I purchased with the Shimano PD-M324 pedals). I used the size chart provided to determine my size and they fit exactly as I hoped. I like the fact that they have 3 velcro straps to keep my feet securely in the shoes during harder efforts. Also, the soles are nice and stiff. I think these shoes are an excellent addition for anyone looking to improve their spin performance.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use with our Peloton bike since I’m pregnant and afraid my shoes size might change; Didn’t want to spend a ton on shoes I’d only use a month. I’ve had them for 1 Month now and they’re exactly what I wanted. No big surprises, but not entirely exciting as far as purchases go. Plenty of toe space and I used the European size off my running shoes for sizing. I can see how they may be a bit restricting if you had a wide foot as the material is not overly flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware, especially those newbies to cycling.. ...
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware, especially those newbies to cycling... Shimano shoes do not follow the standard European sizes. It is not just a 1/2 size up as other reviewers indicate. A 7.5 is normally a 38, but in Shimano its a 40.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna Brown

customer_reviews.title: Go up half a size!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes because they are were the ones recommended to me by my spin studio. Delivery was very fast and the shoe is a nice sleek design. I got the black ones so it goes with everything. I highly recommend going half a size up. I thought the more I wore them they would eventually stretch. I have been wearing these for the past 2 months and they have stretched a tiny bit, but they are still a little tight especially in the front around my toes. Other then that, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Linet

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable and true to size if you know your size
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable and true to size if you know your size. i'm typically a women's 10 shoe and a 43 cycling shoe
customer_reviews.author: Whitney R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great fit but do your research - size 6.5-7 /39 EU
customer_reviews.text: Great fit! Look, go on website and check out their size conversion and your won't be disappointed. I'm a size 7 (running small) or size 6.5 (running large). So buy a 39 EU. Now don't be alarmed when you open the box and put your foot on the bottom. Lace them up and they will fit. Check out the photos of my pointing to where my toe ends. I have not cycled yet so I don't know know how it performs yet.
customer_reviews.author: Chelasaur

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, wrong color.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits perfectly. I am a US size 6.5 in regular shoes (7 in running shoes) and the 38 is perfect. My previous pair was based on a US 7 and the extra room made it difficult to click out of the pedal - Too much ankle movement. My only complaint, and it's significant, is that I ordered a blue and black shoe and received a grey and black shoe. If that's what I wanted then that's what I would have ordered. I'm without a pair of shoes now so I simply have to use them.
customer_reviews.author: SLMHP

customer_reviews.title: Runs really small, but a nice shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: I had to go two sizes up from my “normal” size. I have other size 37 shoes that fit great. I ordered the 38 and had to return and get the 39. I was aftraid the 39 would be slightly too big, but it was actually a nice fit with a comfortable (not thin) sock. Other than the sizing being off, the shoe is nice especially for the price (as compared to other of these types shoes).
customer_reviews.author: Kalena

customer_reviews.title: They fit perfect!! I am not a pro and just ...
customer_reviews.text: I read on old reviews that these run small. I normally wear size7 and ordered size39 on these Shimanno. They fit perfect!! I am not a pro and just wanted to have some nice/quality shoes for my indoor cycling class. These are great and strong! You have to buy cleats separately and install them yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Leal

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my wife as we are getting back into cycling, the first pair I bought were too small, the company refunded be right away and I ordered a larger pair which fit perfectly. The customer service from this company is exceptional and the product is perfect just as ordered would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Greg Boulanger

customer_reviews.title: Good but be careful not to broke your shoe
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my spinning class, because i had to pay $3 for rent it and this store has a good price than any other stores. I like this shoes, but it broken after 5months lasted. I have no idea why. I haven’t throw away, I still keep it. But is this really why broke? Question
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Straps too short
customer_reviews.text: I think the ones I got are defective. I've compared them to some people in my spin class who have the same shoe and my straps are very short. I have narrow feet, but the straps are so short they cut off circulation. Really unhappy about it.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable biking shoes, my first pair.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for spinning class since I've been having foot pain while spinning. I only used them once so far but I like the velcro straps so they can be adjusted easily. They were comfortable (for bunions). I attached the cleats without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Nlcasper

customer_reviews.title: Run a tad small
customer_reviews.text: I wish spin shoes weren’t so expensive but for what is out there, these are actually pretty inexpensive. I’m not UNHAPPY with my purchase but this is my first pair so I don’t have anything to compare to. I would size up, they are a little tight and since they are spin shoes they have zero give and flexibility!
customer_reviews.author: JAL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cycling shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great cycling shoes! I loved them from the first time I had them on for a class! I read the other reviews, and they definitely run small. Bought 2 sizes up & them fit just right.
customer_reviews.author: Galyna

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Used them for the first time today at Soul Cycle and had a great workout. Feels good to have my own cycling shoes and not some stinky rentals. LOL. The cleats are not included. These are true to size and fit snug so if you have a wide foot you might want to go up one size.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Heitmann

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Cycling Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I've been indoor cycling for years now and finally gave in to purchasing cycling shoes. I was hesitant because I didn't want to buy shoes online without knowing the fit or comfort. I was incredibly surprised to find that these shoes are comfortable, made well, and fit as per the size chart. And it was easy to add the SPD clips to them. Definitely worth a try as a first pair!
customer_reviews.author: mjt408

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with fit!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of the reviews said they were happy but upset because the inside lining did not match the picture, but mine did! The inside is blue just as it shows. The size is what I was worried about because I have wide feet ( a size nine ) so based on the reviews I ordered 9.5
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Fiore

customer_reviews.title: They are just ok.  Cheap look and feel but do the trick.
customer_reviews.text: They have a cheap look and feel but they'll do the trick for spin classes. When you put the spd cleat on it's hard to walk. as it sticks out the bottom. Sidi's are much better.
customer_reviews.author: BottomLine

customer_reviews.title: Runs small.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cycling shoe. I wear a size 11 shoe and after reading many shoe reviews I decided to order up so I ordered a size 44. My right foot is almost a size larger than my left. The shoe is great on the left but I could probably have used just a little bit more length in the right. I am keeping them and I think it will be ok. Overall it is a very good looking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: SandyK

customer_reviews.title: Based on the reviews, I ordered a 43 for ...
customer_reviews.text: Based on the reviews, I ordered a 43 for a size 9.5 foot. Way too big! Sending this pair back and have ordered a 41. My original Peloton brand shoe is a 40 and just too tight so I'm upsizing to a 41, hope this fits and I think it will based on how big the 43 was on my 9.5 womens foot.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my cycling glass!! Got tired of renting them for $3 a class. These were priced great and are comfy...needed to go a size up.
customer_reviews.author: JJOhli7

customer_reviews.title: product seems to be of good quality and i like the velcro straps to secure ...
customer_reviews.text: product seems to be of good quality and i like the velcro straps to secure cover better. This cover like all the other covers I have purchased is to long and drags the ground. Most of the grills are similar in height. It causes them to drag the ground and become tattered. Also the info i received with the grill says it is guaranteed but their is no information on how or who to contact about warranty. Absolutely no contact info. It appears to be better than most grill covers i have bought .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soul Cycle Female Size 8
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 8 1/2 wide in tennis shoes (Saucony) and at Soul Cycle I rent a size 8. I purchased a size 41W and they fit perfectly. When i first tried them on they were stiff and i was hesitant to wear them the following morning for my Soul Cycle class, but I wore them and they worked and fit perfectly. I love these shoes, i wish i would have bought them sooner instead of spending $3 per class. Also the Soul Cycle size 8 gave me arch pain during my workouts. maybe the "wide" feature is making the difference because these shoes feel great!
customer_reviews.author: J Pach

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Had to order 3x to get my size, and the third time i skipped a size, ultimately going from 38 to 41. Also, the shoes feels very plastic and extremely cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Goldsoundz

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Normally wear a size 10 and in these I ordered a size 44... perfect fit! Not too narrow like a lot of biking shoes. My feet stay very comfortable for a 45 minute Spin Class -- no numbness or falling asleep. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Fahey

customer_reviews.title: and look super cheap and run very narrow
customer_reviews.text: These are much lower quality than I expected. I was replacing a pair of Shimano's and I thought they would be of similar quality but they are not. They are very plastic-y looking, and look super cheap and run very narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Carol in LA

customer_reviews.title: Toe box was good tho but they run
customer_reviews.text: very narrow in width. Toe box was good tho but they run small
customer_reviews.author: Leesa

customer_reviews.title: Totally changed my ride
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They totally changed my ride. I was previously using regular sneakers and cages, which were killing my feet. But with these my feet no longer hurt. I purchased the Shimano SPD cleats to go with them, they were super easy to install. I used a bike multi-tool that I had already owned for the installation.
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: the shoe is comfortable..
customer_reviews.text: The shipper/store doesn't know their own inventory. This shipped fast, the shoe is comfortable... but its not blue/black. It is black/black. Good thing my wife doesn't mind the black/black combo. Personally I think thats a pretty simple thing to verify before you ship it. '
customer_reviews.author: Beorn

customer_reviews.title: They run small!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 39 believing it was a 7.5 unfortunately it was really small so I am having to return and get the size 40
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!  So tight and narrow and no turquoise!!!
customer_reviews.text: They were way too small. I usually wear an 8 in soul cycle and ordered a 38. So narrow and so tight! I'm definitely returning and there is no turquoise anywhere on the shoe as depicted. They showed up in a beat up box with no shoe box. I'm wondering if these are even real. Buyer beware!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Demos

customer_reviews.title: If you wear a whole size shoe, size up.
customer_reviews.text: I SO wish these shoes were available in whole sizes. I wear a 9 and bought both the 41 and 42 (8.5 and 9.5). As I anticipated, the 8.5 was a little too small and the 9.5 was a little too large. I ended up going with the 9.5 and will buy thicker socks. Fingers crossed that will help.
customer_reviews.author: RLC

customer_reviews.title: Returned these as there weren't good quality and extremely uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Returned these as there weren't good quality and extremely uncomfortable. I'm usually a size 5 in shoes, but would have had to order a 6 or 6.5 in these.
customer_reviews.author: brooke calkins

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit but great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: These have a narrow toe box causing some metatarsal pinching. Otherwise great ride based on the cleats you choose. Not easily adjustable with 2 firm velcro straps but should fit most foot types.
customer_reviews.author: MT PT

customer_reviews.title: Good buy...  using w spd clips for spin
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for spin class after a different brand broke. They work perfect. They are a little narrow. Luckily my feet are narrow. The bottom makes it SO easy to get the clips on.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: I wear a size 8. 5 in women shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 8.5 in women shoes and I bought a 41 which fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Spirituallyricist

customer_reviews.title: I use these for indoor cycling and they are super comfortable. My only complaint is that the shoe ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size 7.5 in tennis shoes and ordered a size 40 and it fit perfectly! I use these for indoor cycling and they are super comfortable. My only complaint is that the shoe has the clips made so they will stick out making it hard to walk around or do anything other than clipping into a bike. Other than that, these shoes are great!!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, 2nd pair of Shimano bike shoes that I have bought. Get them
customer_reviews.author: D. Marin

customer_reviews.title: Needed some replacement shoes and these feel great! I will always stick with Shimanos
customer_reviews.text: Needed some replacement shoes and these feel great! I will always stick with Shimanos :) I'm a size 10 women's and got a 43 EU
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but Toe Clip Probs
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect shoe EXCEPT, the toe clip twists every time I unclip from my bike pedal. Super annoying, then I can’t put the clip back into my pedal because it’s twisted.
customer_reviews.author: Kalli

customer_reviews.title: Buy buy buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to invest in a pair of spinning shoes because I felt I was not getting the full effect of my workout in class. Tried them out for the first time this week and so glad I bought them. Felt muscles working that weren’t before I used the spin shoes. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Schemery

customer_reviews.title: My first spin shoes
customer_reviews.text: They did not come in the colors shown. They are kinda shiny and all black. I would've preferred what is shown. I ordered up 2 sizes and they are a good fit. They seemed a little big but once I was spinning, they were a good fit. They are my first spin shoes and it is a much better ride.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher and Sue March

customer_reviews.title: Great for spin
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for spin. Doesn't come w/clips. Went to local bike shop & purchased they installed.
customer_reviews.author: Shereé Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Best cycling shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I tried many different cycling shoes for my cycling classes and this one is by far the most comfortable. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ragsdale

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This pair has changed my spin classes! So much more power per class, these feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Shuchi

customer_reviews.title: Blisters be warned
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits my foot but they hurt my feet really badly. At first I thought that I was just breaking them in and they would feel better after a few rides by now they hurt my feet so bad I had to clip out of my bike in the middle of a spin class. They gave me blisters on the side of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shows were used scratched and cut on the bottoms. Unacceptable product. We returned to supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Topolski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great but my lining color is not aqua as pictured - it’s just black
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Well made and very comfortable! Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Order +2 from the size chart
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these. Less shiny than the photos. The size chart is very wrong or very small. Order +2 from what the chart says.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan G

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These are the first cycling shoes I have used and they are great!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Great Spin Shoes
customer_reviews.text: True to size. Does not come with the clips as did my previous pairs, so that explains why they are cheaper then other options.
customer_reviews.author: TribecaTracy

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I wear shimano size 37 at my cycle gym - I'm a size 6 in regular shoes. These are SO small and stiff. The shoes are so narrow I can barely Velcro the straps. I wanted to give them a try, but they can't even be worn with a thin pair of socks. Disappointing - I'm not sure why these are so different than the ones at my gym! Will return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing can be tricky, refer to Shimano size chart
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 6.5 in regular shoes, 7.5 in running shoes, and bought a size 39 in these and they are perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Piscean

customer_reviews.title: Size matters
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7 or 7.5 depending on the shoes. I got a size 40 and they were perfect, (i got a size 39 in another brand and they were too tight on 1 foot).
customer_reviews.author: deirdra

customer_reviews.title: I really like them so far
customer_reviews.text: These are my first cycle shoes, so I don't have much to compare them to. I really like them so far! I usually wear an 8.5 in normal shoes and 9 in running shoes... so I bought a 41 and 42 just in case. I kept the 42 because they are quite narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: It’s a nice looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I was interested in this shoe for spinning class. I liked the style of the shoe but it was too big. I didn’t like that once the SPD clip was installed I would be walking on it ...
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Carroscia

customer_reviews.title: If you’re a size 7, get size 39!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re a size 7, get size 39! They are perfect for peloton bike if you install the Look Delt cleats. Perfect for Soul Cycle too. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Christine Chen

customer_reviews.title: Great women's shoe for Peloton (or other indoor cycling bike)
customer_reviews.text: I love the blue color in this shoe, the fit is great (I wear an 8.5 tennis shoe usually), and they work perfectly for my Peloton bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoes work for soul cycle class! They are a ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes work for soul cycle class! They are a bit stiff on the ankle and a little roomier than I thought they would be. I’m usually an 8. Bought a 41. Also, the shoes that came were all black no blue lining.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great feels great
customer_reviews.text: After doing research I got theses shoes. They feel much better than regular shoes and the pricepoint is great.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Thomas Reviews

customer_reviews.title: ... a size up based on reviews and it fits great. I wear a US women’s 8
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size up based on reviews and it fits great. I wear a US women’s 8.5 and ordered a 42. Been using it in my soul cycle class and love them. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JHope

customer_reviews.title: Price is right and fit well
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses these for cycling eveyday and she says there are very confortable and fit well
customer_reviews.author: B8B8

customer_reviews.title: Other than that the shoes were perfect. I am a 7
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get the blue and black color I selected, it was grey and black so knock off 1 star for that. Other than that the shoes were perfect. I am a 7.5, 8 in boots and got a 41.. same size that soulcycle gave me.. I prob would have fit into a 40 but they didnt have it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: The person was very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift. The person was very happy with them. Thank you amazon for reminding me I could use my credit card points toward the purchase. Saved me $70.00
customer_reviews.author: cathy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Soul Cycle. But don't go by the Soul Cycle sizes- these are different.
customer_reviews.author: CRead918

customer_reviews.title: The shoes I got were not the one in the ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes I got were not the one in the image. I received shoes with grey lining not blue and overall it seemed to be a different shimano shoe than depicted.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen 1882

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and fit true to size. I am a size 8 and ordered size 40 and they fit perfectly. Purchased look delta cleats separately that were easy to attach!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for spinning, they clip in and work great. They're comfortable. I ordered 1 size up since reviews stated they ran small, and they were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Fit
customer_reviews.text: I was very please with look and fit of this cycling shoe. I have worn them once already and I didn’t notice any foot pain. Overall pleased with the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought these for cycling class and has struggled with them ever since. We are now past the return window and are stuck with shoes that don not work! Terrible!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin B.

customer_reviews.title: So glad I looked at reviews before hand
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7-7.5 and I got size 39 and fits just right. So glad I looked at reviews before hand.Tried them out in spin class after getting some cleates and wow what an amazing difference those shoes make!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Allison

customer_reviews.title: Tired of Renting Spin Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for indoor spin class. Ordered same size as the shoes I used to rent at Soul Cycle. I’m usually a size 7.5-8 in shoes. Size 40 in the Shimano is perfect. Much prefer to have my own.
customer_reviews.author: Marji Gordon-Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, they are narrow, I use them for my indoor cycling class and have had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: mandy perez

customer_reviews.title: The sizing chart is so off I returned the item ...
customer_reviews.text: The sizing chart is so off I returned the item twice (each time going up a size) before I finally gave up
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Gomez

customer_reviews.title: & I love them. Def recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’m normally a 7.5 - 8, I ordered the 39. It was way too small, so I exchanged for the 40 & they fit perfectly. Worn once so far, & I love them. Def recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M. Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes ! They do run a bit small. I normally wear a 38/6.5 shoe and had to size up to a 39 here.
customer_reviews.author: smcclain

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality material.
customer_reviews.text: Wore them for the first time and the plastic is already wearing down. Poor quality. The clips wore into the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mistry

customer_reviews.title: Don’t forget to buy the clips if you are using for Peleton or SoulCycle!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe but to work with Peleton or with SoulCycle you have to buy the clips separately and install.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Tripp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoes for SoulCycle! Great price and comfortable- would recommend for anyone needing indoor cycling shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Ehler

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually a size 8 in women's sneakers (Nike) and by the reviews I saw they ran small so I ordered a Euro size 40 and they were so tight. I habe to return and try the 41. The sizing is really tough with cycling shoes :(
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: light weight, wife likes them..uses them 2-3 times a week
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ahn
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. The stitching on the tongue could have been neater but over all these shoes are satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are extremely loose on the bike and not supportive at all! DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are extremely loose on the bike and not supportive at all! DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe so far!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I'm usually a 6.5 and i ordered a 39 based on other reviews. Fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: I really like these shoes I just wish they came in different ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes I just wish they came in different colors! Great for Soul Cycle class too!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: I wear a size 8 and from what I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 8 and from what I have read that which I did and it is a bit small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise a good fit.
customer_reviews.text: Top of the tongue that rests at the front of the ankle is stiff and somewhat uncomfortable when pedaling, with every stroke, If it softens up over time it will be tolerable. Otherwise a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: inger robertson

customer_reviews.title: Not the same shoe
customer_reviews.text: They did not come with the blue lining. This is false advertising. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Optimal for indoor cycling
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are light and sturdy. Excellent for indoor cycling.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Mahbob
